title: Quick Advice Generator
description: A sleek and intuitive app designed to provide users with instant, bite-sized advice. This app delivers concise advice at the tap of a button.

title: IMDb Clone
description: An IMDb app clone utilizing the IMDb Rapid API, allowing users to view trending and top-rated movies. The app also features a search function to find specific movie and see their IMDb ratings.

title: My Portfolio
description: This portfolio highlights my expertise in different technologies. Explore my work and learn more about my journey as a developer.
